Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

assetBalance().details: This could be greater than the amount the pool can withdraw due to lack of liquidity.

returns._0: uint256 number of assets in ZAI

deposit(uint256).details: If the external pool requires a different amount to be passed in, the conversion should occur here as the Hub passes ZAI amounts.msg.sender must be the hub.

params.amount: amount in asset (ZAI) terms that we want to deposit

returns._0: uint256 number of assets in ZAI
uint256 number of assets in ZAI

withdraw(uint256).details: If the external pool requires a different amount to be passed in the conversion should occur here as the Hub passes ZAI amounts.msg.sender must be the hub.

params.amount: amount in asset (ZAI) terms that we want to withdraw

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit assets (ZAI) in the external pool.

maxDeposit().notice: Maximum number of assets the pool could deposit at present.

maxWithdraw().notice: Maximum number of assets the pool could withdraw at present.

postDebtChange().notice: Some external pools require actions after debt changes

preDebtChange().notice: Some external pools require actions before debt changes

redeemable().notice: returns address of redeemable tokens (if any)

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw assets (ZAI) from the external pool.

userdoc.notice: A direct deposit module that deposits into ZeroLend directly
